data.title: Hilarie Burton Morgan
data.meta_description: Hilarie Burton Morgan is an American actress who portrayed Lucille Smith in AMC's The Walking Dead. Burton was born in Sterling, Virginia. data.text:
Hilarie Burton Morgan is an American actress who portrayed Lucille Smith in AMC's The Walking Dead.

Biography[]

Burton was born in Sterling, Virginia. Her father is a veteran of the US Army, and her mother is a real estate agent. She is the eldest of four children with three brothers. She graduated from Park View High School in 2000, where she was student council treasurer her sophomore year, vice-president her junior year, and captain of the cheerleading squad, student council president, and homecoming queen her senior year.

Other Works[]

Our Very Own

Normal Adolescent Behavior

Solstice

The List

The Secret Life of Bees

The True-Love Tale of Boyfriend & Girlfriend

One Tree Hill

White Collar

Grey's Anatomy

Hostages

Surprised by Love

Extant

Lethal Weapon

Council of Dads

Trivia[]

Her husband in real life, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, portrays Lucille's husband, Negan.

Their son, Gus Morgan, portrayed a walker in "Out of the Ashes".[1]

While starring on the show One Tree Hill, she worked with Austin Nichols, who portrayed Spencer Monroe.
